meta.title: Privacy Policy | Tutor Advantage
meta.description: Learn how Tutor Advantage protects and handles your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Tutor Advantage, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the platform.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us as well as information automatically collected when you use our platform:

items.0: Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number)
items.1: Profile information (Educational background, teaching experience, learning preferences)
items.3: Communication records between tutors and students

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

items.0: Providing and personalizing our educational services
items.1: Processing payments and managing our MLM structure
items.2: Analyzing and improving our platform's performance
items.3: Communicating with you about your account and our services

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have certain rights regarding your personal information:

items.0: Right to access your personal information
items.2: Right to request deletion of your information
items.3: Right to restrict processing of your information
items.5: Right to object to processing of your information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

consent.title: Cookie Settings
consent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic.
consent.details: By accepting, you agree to the use of cookies and similar technologies for the purposes described in our Privacy Policy. You can change your preferences at any time by visiting our Privacy Policy page.

acceptance.title: Privacy Policy Acceptance
acceptance.description: Before you continue using Tutor Advantage
acceptance.details: To use our platform, you must read and accept our Privacy Policy. This ensures you understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at privacy@tutoradvantage.com

meta.title: Terms of Service | Tutor Advantage
meta.description: Learn about the terms and conditions for using Tutor Advantage

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Tutor Advantage. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account. If you are under 18, you must have parental consent to use our services.

account.title: Account Creation and Security
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access.

services.title: Educational Services
services.content: We provide an online platform connecting students with tutors. We do not guarantee specific educational outcomes.

mlm.title: MLM Structure
mlm.content: Our platform includes a multi-level marketing component. Earnings are based on actual tutoring services provided and network development.

items.0: Commission structure is transparent and documented
items.2: Success depends on individual effort and market conditions
items.3: Compliance with local MLM regulations is required

payments.title: Payments and Refunds
payments.content: All payments are processed securely. Refund policies vary by service type and are subject to our refund policy.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: Users must behave professionally and ethically. Harassment, spam, or illegal activities are prohibited.

content.title: Content and Intellectual Property
content.content: Users retain rights to their content but grant us license to use it for platform operations.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate accounts for violations of these terms or illegal activities.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms periodically. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at terms@tutoradvantage.com
